Statute.Title: Fall Economic Statement Implementation Act, 2023
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Exécution de l’énoncé économique de l’automne 2023, Loi d’)

Minister.Text: Introduced by Deputy Minister and Minister of Finance

Transitional.Text: Transitional Provisions, 2024, c. 15, ss. 267 to 269, 275, 276, 355 and 364

CIF.Text: CIF 2024, c. 15 in force on assent 20.06.2024, except,

— s. 2(4) deemed in force 28.03.2023 see s. 2(10)

— s. 148(1) deemed in force 01.10.2022 see s. s. 148(3)
— ss. 155(1) to (3) deemed in force 01.04.2023 see s. 155(4)
— ss. 186 to 195 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 196 — Not in force
— ss. 197 to 203 in force on the 540th day after the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 208 — Not in force
— s. 209, enacting ss. 1 to 18 of the Canada Water Agency Act in force 15.10.2024 see SI/2024-49

— ss. 238, 239(1) and (4), 240, 241, 243, 244(2), 245(2), 246, 247(1) and (2), 248(2), (4) and (7), 254, 255, 256(1), 257, 259, 264 et 270 in force on the first anniversary of the day on which this Act receives royal assent (20.06.2025) see s. 272
— ss. 273 and 274 come into force on the second anniversary of the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 277 — Not in force
— ss. 280, 303 and 304 in force on the 60th day after the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 306(3) (19.08.2024)
— ss. 307 to 316 in force on the 90th day after the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 317 (18.09.2024)
— s. 318 deemed in force 22.06.2023 see s. 319

— s. 339 comes into force on the second anniversary of the day on which this Act receives royal assent or on an earlier day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 341(1) — Not in force
— s. 340 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 341(2) — Not in force
— ss. 342 to 354 and 356 to 363 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 365 — Not in force
See also various application provisions throughout
